Package index

All functions

benefit()
Calculate taxon conservation benefit
beta_diversity()
Compute a pairwise community phylogenetic similarity matrix
build_tree_ranges()
Derive ranges for the internal nodes of a tree
get_tip_occs()
Occurrence matrix for terminal taxa
snape()
Smooth Neo- And Paleo-Endemism (SNAPE) analysis
sphy()
Create a spatial phylogeny object
sphy_canape()
Binary randomization tests including CANAPE
sphy_dist()
Compute a phyologenetic turnover matrix
sphy_diversity()
Calculate spatial phylogenetic diversity and endemism metrics
sphy_prioritize()
Phylogenetic conservation prioritization
sphy_rand()
Null model randomization analysis of alpha diversity metrics
sphy_regions()
Phyologenetic regionalization
sphy_rgb()
Color space ordination of spatial phylogentic composition
sphy_simulate()
Simulate a toy spatial phylogenetic dataset
strand()
Stratified randomization of community matrix
to_raster()
Convert a site-by-variable matrix into a raster brick
